data.text:
@garycdavison @billyrunaway Sorry so late to reply, Gary. I went all-in on the movie after this post. 
"Done before," using song tracks to energize a drama into a musical-like state? I can't truly say but I can't think of one. I know that later, AmericanGraffiti & GoodFellas used the tack to GREAT success.
@garycdavison @KeysSteven and antonia's 'if you want to ne a nird' was written in 1969 but i'm bot sure thay it was written for the movie specifically

@billyrunaway @KeysSteven You got me.  Not watching #EasyRider at the moment, just dry tweeting based on very old memories while watching #ASpecialDay. 

#TCMParty

@KeysSteven Very astute comment.

Principals don't sing or dance.

No original songs written for the film (I think).

Multiple artists (c.f., #TheGraduate) who don't appear in the film.

Had anything quite like this been done before?

#TCMParty #EasyRider
